scripts.dev: npm run clean:ports && concurrently "npm run dev -w frontend" "npm run start:dev -w backend"
scripts.clean:ports: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$p = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000, 5173 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique; if ($p) { $p | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_ -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }; exit 0"
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
